sub_title: Former CEO of the Jadran Hoteli in Croatia
summary:
I have over 30 years of experience in the Hospitality Industry, of which 10 years as General Manager and another 10 years as both Regional Manager and GM for luxury hotel chains. I have delivered first-rate operational planning and guest-focused service as both a Regional and General Manager for the Park Plaza Group in the Netherlands, Starwood Spain in the Canary Islands, as well as multiple high-end hotels across Israel and in Mexico. My solid leadership talents and ability to establish clear, measurable objectives have consistently set the stage for my teams to achieve those goals expertly.

From 2016 to 2022, I was Senior Vice President of Asset Management for GFG Real Estate Asset Management in Mexico. In that role, I supported hotel owners of twelve luxury hotels in Mexico operated by Hyatt, Marriott, Hilton, and AM Resorts to maximize revenues and reduce costs. This I did by enhancing market share, supporting and guiding the sales forces, negotiating corporate contracts, analyzing and improving yearly budgets, and aligning operational effectiveness with hotel owner requirements.

Currently, I am the CEO of the Jadran Hotel group in Croatia. In that capacity, I oversee the management teams of, among others, the hotels Jadran, Continental, Neboder, and Lucija in the Rijeka area, the Uvala Scott Resort on the Dubno Bay, and the Oštro Villas and Camping in Kraljevica. The Jadran Hotel group has recently changed hands and will undergo a major overhaul in the coming years; I will also lead the rebranding of the hotels.
